title: Does anyone here dodge people that play certain champs?
body:
I'm first pick.  My sup main gets banned, no biggie.

Then mid picks Zed, Top picks Riven, Jungle picks Kindred, and my adc is Lucian.

I got scared, 100% chance one of those guys, is that guy.  Really the only way it gets worse is if Lucian is Vayne.   Am I bad for dodging? Should I feel bad? Do you dodge these? I felt bad.  They are probably the nicest players I've seen all day.
